title: Is AI Causing a Productivity Boom?
description: The US economy seems to be in the throes of one of its biggest bursts of productivity in decades, weighing on business labor costs and hastening the disinflation process. If artificial intelligence is partly the reason for the gains, then it’s plausible that we’re in the early days of durable improvements to efficiency. And yet, the numbers are also shrouded in mystery, and the Federal Reserve should greet them caution rather than as a green light to keep lowering interest rates.
content: The US economy seems to be in the throes of one of its biggest bursts of productivity in decades, weighing on business labor costs and hastening the disinflation process. If artificial intelligence is partly the reason for the gains, then it’s plausi... [708 chars]

title: China reviews Meta’s $2 billion deal to buy AI startup Manus
description: Chinese officials are looking into whether Meta Platforms Inc.'s acquisition of artificial intelligence startup Manus violated regulations, an initial review that could hinder the deal down the road if officials determine wrongdoing.
content:

title: Illegal images allegedly made by Musk’s Grok, watchdog says
description: The UK watchdog responsible for classifying and flagging online child sexual abuse material to law enforcement agencies said it found "criminal" images on the dark web allegedly generated by Grok, the artificial intelligence tool tied to Elon Musk's X.

title: Alphabet overtakes Apple, becoming second to Nvidia in size
description: Alphabet Inc. has overtaken Apple Inc. to become the second-most valuable company by market capitalization, a reflection of how the Google parent has emerged as one of the most significant winners of artificial intelligence.

title: Toronto lawyer linked to deadly triple shooting loses appeal
description: A Toronto lawyer linked to a mortgage fraud that was later cited as the motive behind a deadly triple shooting in 2024 has lost his appeal to get his legal licence back after he was caught using artificial intelligence to plead his case.
content:

title: Samsung forecasts Q4 profit to triple to record high
description: SEOUL — Samsung Electronics on Thursday projected a threefold jump in fourth-quarter (Q4) operating profit from a year earlier to a record high as tight supply and a surge in artificial intelligence (AI)-driven demand stoked prices for conventional memory chips.

title: Google, Character.AI agree to settle suits involving teen suicide
description: SAN FRANCISCO ― Google and startup Character.AI have settled lawsuits filed by families accusing artificial intelligence chatbots of harming minors, including contributing to a Florida teenager's suicide, according to court filings on Wednesday.
